page.title: 08EDUCATION IN MORDIFORD
page.content: In our D-Block area (Mordiford) there was only one school, Mordiford Primary. The School was established in the 1880's. It stands in three acres of land and is staffed by it's Headmaster Mr Maggs & three other teachers. The school at the moment has 56 pupils in the age range 5 to 11 but the attendance is slowly declining (although recently there have been no school closures in the area). The catchment area of the school takes in Hampton Bishop, Dormington & Mordiford itself. The school holds a number of fetes, fairs & school plays to raise funds for itself & to provide entertainment for the local community. Most of the pupils when they leave the school at the age of 11 go to Bishop's, St. Mary's or Aylestone.
